Interface IControlCommandInvokeable

All Known Subinterfaces:
IExternalSystemAdapter, IPipelineStage, IProcessModelAdapter
All Known Implementing Classes:
ConvertStage, ExampleESAdapter, ExamplePMAdapter, PipelineStage, RedundancyResolverStage, SignalTraceStage
public interface IControlCommandInvokeable

Interface for classes that have the possibility of invoking control commands.

Method Summary
 java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> invokeControlCommand(Command command)
          Invokes a control command.
 

Method Detail

invokeControlCommand

java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> invokeControlCommand(Command command)
                                                                      throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                                                             java.io.IOException
Invokes a control command.

Used to invoke commands to control the behavior of the implementation. The commands are specific to each implementation of this interface.

Parameters:
command - The command to invoke.
Returns:
A map of result parameters.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the given command or any parameter is illegal.
java.io.IOException - If the execution of the command failed.
